title: Lurrie Bell - 2013 - Blues In My Soul FLAC
description:
Lurrie Bell - 2013 - Blues In My Soul

One of the greatest living Chicago blues guitarists, Lurrie Bell's last two CDs have been about stretching him (successfully) to showcase the breadth as well as the magnitude of his art. However for this project he just wanted to get back to the solid foundation of Chicago-styled traditional guitar blues, done with his rare blend of reverence, involvement and individuality and framed largely by his working band. Blues In My Soul features three Lurrie Bell originals plus covers of songs recorded by Little Walter, T-Bone Walker, Jimmy Rogers, Otis Spann, Junior Wells, Big Bill Broonzy and others. Lurrie Bell, vocals, guitar: Roosevelt Purifoy, piano, organ; Melvin Smith, bass, Willie "The Touch" Hayes, drums; and on six songs Matthew Skoller, harmonica. Produced by Dick Shurman. (delmark)

Track list:
01 - Hey Hey Baby
02 - Blues in My Soul
03 - I Feel so Good
04 - She's a Good 'Un
05 - 'Bout the Break of Day
06 - Going Away Baby
07 - 24 Hour Blues
08 - My Little Machine
09 - I Just Keep Loving Her
10 - T-Bone Blues Special
11 - Just the Blues
12 - South Side to Riverside
13 - If It's Too Late
14 - Blues Never Die

Enjoy and share!
